subject: Self Care
title: The Energy Audit
description: A 60-second lesson on The Energy Audit.

hook.text: Track your energy for one week: what tasks drain you, what tasks fuel you. The pattern will surprise you.

buildup.text: An energy audit reveals which activities, people, and environments deplete versus restore your daily energy.

discovery.text: Most people discover that 20% of their tasks cause 80% of their exhaustion. Those tasks are the burnout drivers.

twist.text: Sometimes the draining tasks are ones you think you should enjoy. Social expectation and reality often don't align.

climax.text: Delegate, minimize, or restructure the top drainers. Protect and expand the energizers. That's preventive self-care.

punchline.text: Know your drains. Protect your energizers. Audit weekly.

quiz.question: What does an energy audit typically reveal?
options: About 20% of tasks cause 80% of exhaustion
